\documentclass[tikz, 11pt]{standalone}

\input{../tikz_settings.tex}

\newcommand{\vSep}{1mm}
\newcommand{\hSep}{5mm}
% Define the example name here
\def\exampleName{ex_2_config_visualization}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[x=\unit, y=\unit]

% Panels
\node[panel] (a) {\includegraphics[]{"../../outputs/\exampleName/panels/dim_panel"}};
\node[panel, anchor=west, xshift=\hSep](b) at (a.east) {\includegraphics[]{"../../outputs/\exampleName/panels/margin_panel"}};
\node[panel, anchor=west, xshift=\hSep](c) at (b.east) {\includegraphics[]{"../../outputs/\exampleName/panels/axes_separation_panel"}};

% Keys
\foreach \n/\t in {a/dimensions, b/margins, c/axes\_separation} {
    \node[headingNode, anchor=south, yshift=\vSep] at (\n.north) {\headingSize\t};
}

% Heading
\node[headingNode, anchor=south, yshift=6*\vSep] (h1) at (b.north) {\figHeading{Panel config keys visually explained}};
\draw[lineShort] (h1.west) -- (h1-|a.west);
\draw[lineShort] (h1.east) -- (h1-|c.east);	

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
